item.title: (Brief)Intro to Python
item.description: Python Expereince Although my biostats and computational biology courses were based on R Studio, the latter class introduced me to Python. Range of python concepts included basic functions as simple as the one shown below: 2+2 ## 4 We also got exposed to more advanced tools in python, such as finding IP addresses using Regex (regular expressions) as shown: import re string1="Jan 13 00:48:59: DROP service 68->67(udp) from 213.92.153.167 to 69.
